metadata.Title: CVE-2021-45832 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A Stack-based Buffer Overflow Vulnerability exists in HDF5 1.13.1-1 at athdf5/src/H5Eint.c, which causes a Denial of Service (context-dependent).

criterions.comment: hdf5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
paraview: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
